title: Ebro In The Morning - Big Energy Saga Continues + The Importance Of Lotion
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 1/20/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez, and the crew are in the studio - Ebro talks about Big Energy and asks the listeners to weigh-in (47). The crew discusses Rosenberg lotioning etiquette (53), the future of covid and it's effects on children (39), and the gurus go sideways (1:10).

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Click here to learn about the Hot 97 - Securing the Future initiative. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
